original_text: Perhaps a man may meet a young girl who has not had sex with any man before. He might deceive her to have sex with her. If she has not yet promised to marry another man, he must marry her. He must give the right gifts to her parents.
korean_text: 사람이 약혼하지 아니한 처녀를 꾀어 동침하였으면 납폐금을 주고 아내로 삼을 것이요

sentences.original_text: Perhaps a man may meet a young girl
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 한 남자가 어린 소녀를 만날 수 있다

sentences.original_text: who has not had sex with any man before
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 이전에 어떤 남자와도 성관계를 가진 적이 없는

sentences.original_text: He might deceive her to have sex with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀를 속여 성관계를 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: If she has not yet promised to marry another man
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그녀가 다른 남자와 결혼하기로 약속하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: He must give the right gifts to her parents
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀의 부모에게 적절한 선물을 주어야 한다
